params._treasury: The address to receive slashed stakes

endorseWithAutoRegister(address,uint8,by.details: Auto-registers sender in ScoreRegistry if not already registered

params.senderScoreHash: The score hash for lazy registration of sender

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.endorsementId: The ID of the endorsement to slash

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.endorsementId: The ID of the endorsement to withdraw

DECAY_RATE_PER_MONTH().notice: Decay rate per month (10% = 1000 basis points)

DECAY_START_PERIOD().notice: Period before decay starts (6 months in seconds)

endorseWithAutoRegister(address,uint8,by.notice: Give endorsement with auto-registration for the sender

getEndorsementWeight(address).notice: Get the total endorsement weight for a user (considering decay)

getEndorsements(address).notice: Get all endorsements for a user

getEndorsementsByEndorser(address).notice: Get all endorsements made by an endorser

setScoreRegistry(address).notice: Set the ScoreRegistry address for auto-registration

slashEndorsement(uint256).notice: Slash an endorsement (admin only, sends stake to protocol)

withdrawEndorsement(uint256).notice: Withdraw an endorsement (partial stake return based on decay)
